description: Update the service pipeline. There are four modes for updating a service pipeline. The deploymentType field defines the mode. NONE. In this mode, a deployment doesn't occur. Only the requested metadata parameters are updated. CURRENT_VERSION. In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the new spec that you provide. Only requested parameters are updated. Don't include major or minor version parameters when you use this deployment-type. MINOR_VERSION. In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the published, recommended (latest) minor version of the current major version in use, by default. You can specify a different minor version of the current major version in use. MAJOR_VERSION. In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the published, recommended (latest) major and minor version of the current template by default. You can specify a different major version that's higher than the major version in use and a minor version.

parameters.name: deploymentType
parameters.description: The deployment type. There are four modes for updating a service pipeline. The deploymentType field defines the mode. NONE In this mode, a deployment doesn't occur. Only the requested metadata parameters are updated. CURRENT_VERSION In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the new spec that you provide. Only requested parameters are updated. Don't include major or minor version parameters when you use this deployment-type. MINOR_VERSION In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the published, recommended (latest) minor version of the current major version in use, by default. You can specify a different minor version of the current major version in use. MAJOR_VERSION In this mode, the service pipeline is deployed and updated with the published, recommended (latest) major and minor version of the current template, by default. You can specify a different major version that's higher than the major version in use and a minor version.

parameters.name: serviceName
parameters.description: The name of the service to that the pipeline is associated with.

parameters.name: spec
parameters.description: The spec for the service pipeline to update.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatus
nested_items.description: The deployment status of the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: deploymentStatusMessage
nested_items.description: A service pipeline deployment status message.

nested_items.name: lastAttemptedDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last attempted deployment of this service pipeline.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentAttemptedAt
nested_items.description: The time when a deployment of the service pipeline was last attempted.

nested_items.name: lastDeploymentSucceededAt
nested_items.description: The time when the service pipeline was last deployed successfully.

nested_items.name: lastSucceededDeploymentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the last successful deployment of this service pipeline.

nested_items.name: spec
nested_items.description: The service spec that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMajorVersion
nested_items.description: The major version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateMinorVersion
nested_items.description: The minor version of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.

nested_items.name: templateName
nested_items.description: The name of the service template that was used to create the service pipeline.
